title: The little problem I had renting a house
description: Fifty-three years ago, James A. White Sr. joined the US Air Force. But as an African American man, he had to go to shocking lengths to find a place for his young family to live nearby. He tells this powerful story about the lived experience of "everyday racism" -- and how it echoes today in the way he's had to teach his grandchildren to interact with police.
author: James A. White Sr.
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, inequality, race, social change, society
